S.FORM: tmwang cnba'an cyu mpanga tokan uba mu, nya na rasun lalow nya ro patus nya uy, musa myan cbu yapit bih iyik rgyax, musa myan cbu 'cyux Tayal uy. cyan cminun sali' uya mu hiya, myasa ci tegan cninun nya kwara lukus. yaya mu ga kba' ci pskulu mnrang sumul, kba' ci thapuy rami uy. cyu utux tipik bnelu' mu, hopa cu babow nya laga, musa cu tmwang cnba'an yow na Tayal, mwah s'yanux sali' mu.
